Printouts

Formats for printouts were developed and installed during implementation. Depending on the clinical environment you may need to configure the behavior of printouts as follows:

l Auto-Printouts: The application can print patient data automatically up to 15 times each day. This feature would typically be used in Critical Care Manager.

l Print on transfer/discharge: The application can open the Printout Loader window automatically when the user ends a session. This feature would typically be used in an Anesthesia Manager and PACU Manager.

For more information, see the Printouts Guide.
